data.title: David Thwaites on LinkedIn: #ev #infrastructure #sites #acquisitions
data.meta_description:
A day of inspections (20 in fact!) for the hottest day of the year with Be.EV.  

Visited some really good sites, many of which will be ideal in delivering the…
data.text:
Interested in working with Be.EV? We’re seeking experienced Land Agents, Surveyors and Property Specialists to work with us to help locate prime EV charging locations across the UK. Joining our experienced team, we need specialists to assist us part-time in expanding across key UK regions, including: ✅ London ✅ South East ✅ South Coast ✅ Home Counties ✅ Whole of the UK (roadside specialists) We'll provide training to align your skills with the sector and our needs, along with a retainer and, of course, a success fee. With our recent £55m boost in funding, we have ample capital to invest, offering a great chance to earn a good level of success fee. The demand for charging infrastructure is on the rise, and you can be part of the Be.EV journey from the start, developing new skills and making a positive impact. For all the details, click here: https://lnkd.in/eHxMcDAA #EVCharging #NetZeroJobs #ElectricVehicles #Property #Land

Fancy a drink with the Be.EV team? 🥃 We’re gearing up for this year’s Completely Retail Marketplace in London and can’t wait to see partners new and old, so here’s who you can expect to see 👇 🟩 Asif, Co-Founder and CEO 💼 Paul, Head of Business Development ⚙️ John, Partnerships & Acquisition Manager ⏩ Michelle, EV Development Improvement Manager 📊 Matthew, Business Development Manager 🏢 Michael, Land Agent 📈 Giuseppe, Land Agent 🗺️ David, Land Agent 🏗️ Ben, Land Agent The team will be on hand to chat all things EV charging, revenue and retail at Stand 53 – plus we’ll be hosting drinks at The Walrus and The Carpenter to keep the discussions rolling - join us from 4pm til late. Sound good? We’ll see you there! 📅 Tuesday 30th April 🍻 The Walrus and The Carpenter (EC3R 8BU)

Free drinks, site rEVenue calculator and expert EV insight – we’re gearing up for this year’s Completely Retail Marketplace. Make sure to visit us at Stand 53! But first, let's spill the *electric* beans on what's in store for you… 🍻 First up… free drinks! 🍻 We've taken over the Walrus & Carpenter, just a stone's throw away from the Old Billingsgate venue. Grab your free drinks vouchers from any of our bright green-gilet-clad team members or snag them at our stand. Join us from 4pm onwards for some refreshing drinks and great conversations! ⚡But wait… there's more! ⚡ Have you ever wondered how adding an EV charging solution could boost your bottom line? Look no further than our rEVenue Calculator! Tell us your site's name or postcode, and in under 10 minutes, voilà! You'll have a custom e-dashboard at your fingertips. Discover if your site passes our scoring test and get recommendations on the ideal charging solution. So, mark your calendars and make a beeline for stand no. 53. We can't wait to see you there! John MacBrayne Michelle Walker Michael Muskat Paul Lucherini David Thwaites Matthew Barrett Asif Ghafoor Giuseppe Zanré Will Stratton-Morris Ben Roberts #CompletelyRetail #BeEV #EVcharging #FreeDrinks #RevenueBoost

We've had an upgrade! We're excited to share that team Be.EV has a new home in Central Manchester 🏡 Due to our ultra-rapid growth, we've signed a new lease with Bruntwood SciTech and have taken over a whole floor of their office space... not to mention our full redesign of the space 🙌🎨 Our CEO and Co-Founder, Asif Ghafoor, says: ”We’re delighted to be at the heart of the Manchester business community and looking forward to enjoying our new home. Although we are a national network, our roots are proudly in Manchester and the northwest. This year has been a year of growth for Be.EV and our new office is the perfect headquarters from which to put our exciting plans for 2024 into place.” ⭐️ We'd like to in particular thank Heavenly for their creative vision; Emma Moore for her incredible ideas and support; White Circle Ltd for their design and project management prowess and our very own Victoria Blair for her tireless efforts! 💚 Read all about it ⬇️ https://lnkd.in/eYJM68Ap Harpswood #BeEV #EVcharging #EVcharging #ChargePointOperator #CPO #NewOffice #Manchester #CentralManchester
